thread.title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Sells 51 Pct Stake In Chinese Subsidiary GRS-HS To Riswein Health Industry Investment

title: BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Sells 51 Pct Stake In Chinese Subsidiary GRS-HS To Riswein Health Industry Investment

organizations.name: riswein health industry investment reuters staff

text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:21 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Genesis Healthcare Sells 51 Pct Stake In Chinese Subsidiary GRS-HS To Riswein Health Industry Investment Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Genesis Healthcare Inc: 
* PRESS RELEASE - GENESIS HEALTHCARE SELLS 51% STAKE IN CHINESE SUBSIDIARY GRS-HS TO RISWEIN HEALTH INDUSTRY INVESTMENT CO., LTD 
* GENESIS HEALTHCARE INC - DEAL FOR $30 MILLION 
* GENESIS HEALTHCARE INC - IN INTERIM, RISWEIN WILL LEND GRS-HS $5 MILLION, WHICH WILL FUND OPERATING EXPENSES DURING WOFE APPROVAL PROCESS 
* GENESIS HEALTHCARE INC - RISWEIN AND GRS-HS WILL USE $30 MILLION TO FURTHER FUND EXPANSION IN CHINA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
